__type.name: Issue
__type.description: An Issue is a place to discuss ideas, enhancements, tasks, and bugs for a project.

type.name: LockReason
type.description: The possible reasons that an issue or pull request was locked.

type.name: Actor
type.description: Represents an object which can take actions on GitHub. Typically a User or Bot.

type.name: DateTime
type.description: An ISO-8601 encoded UTC date string.

type.name: PullRequestConnection
type.description: The connection type for PullRequest.

type.name: Int
type.description: Represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.
